name: Me and you, get lost in Saigon.
description: I know that you guys wanna experience something news in Saigon. The new experiences that you've never been before. Me too. Maybe I'm Saigonese, I know more than you guys about Saigon but I don't know everything yet. Just like you, I wanna discover more about the place I'm living, I wanna know more, feel more, get more.
